mapper.insert: insert into board (num, writer, title, content, reg_date, boardnum, tablenum, files) values( board_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, #{boardnum}, 99, #{files} )
mapper.select: select NVL(max(num), 0) from board where tablenum=99
select num from board where tablenum=99 and boardnum=#{boardnum}
select count(*) from board where tablenum=99
select * from (select b.*, rownum r from (select * from board order by reg_date desc) b) where r >= #{start} and r <= #{end} and tablenum=99
select * from board where num = #{num} and tablenum=99
select * from files where boardnum = #{num} and tablenum=99
